sections.heading: Nonfulfillment of conditions or nonperformance of charges that donee can perform or preventIf a donation is made on a condition that the donee has the power to perform or prevent, or depends on the performance of a charge by the donee, the nonfulfillment of the condition or the nonperformance of the
sections.text: Nonfulfillment of conditions or nonperformance of charges that donee can perform or preventIf a donation is made on a condition that the donee has the power to perform or prevent, or depends on the performance of a charge by the donee, the nonfulfillment of the condition or the nonperformance of the charge does not, of right, operate a dissolution of the donation. It may be dissolved only by consent of the parties or by judicial decree.Acts 2008, No. 204, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 2009.
